rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C177706

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire SF8 v1.0 Acute Test Code Terminology

definition: Short Form 8 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 test code.
name: Short Form 8 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire SF8 v1.0 Acute Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Short Form 8 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - Overall, how would you rate your health during the past week?
terms.preferredTerm: SF8 v1.0 Acute - Overall How You Rate Your Health
synonyms: SF82-Overall How You Rate Your Health

terms.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, how much did physical health problems limit your usual physical activities (walking, climbing stairs)?
terms.preferredTerm: SF8 v1.0 Acute - How Much Limit Physical Activities

terms.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, how much difficulty did you have doing your daily work, both at home and away from home, because of your physical health?
terms.preferredTerm: SF8 v1.0 Acute - Difficulty Doing Daily Work

terms.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - How much bodily pain have you had during the past week?
terms.preferredTerm: SF8 v1.0 Acute - How Much Bodily Pain Have You Had
synonyms: SF82-How Much Bodily Pain Have You Had

terms.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, how much energy did you have?
terms.preferredTerm: SF8 v1.0 Acute - How Much Energy Did You Have
synonyms: SF82-How Much Energy Did You Have

terms.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, how much did your physical health or emotional problems limit your usual social activities with family or friends?
terms.preferredTerm: SF8 v1.0 Acute - Physical, Emotional Limit Activities

terms.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, how much have you been bothered by emotional problems (such as feeling anxious, depressed or irritable)?
terms.preferredTerm: SF8 v1.0 Acute - Bothered by Emotional Problems

terms.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Acute, US Version 1.0 - During the past week, how much did personal or emotional problems keep you from doing your usual work, school or other daily activities?
terms.preferredTerm: SF8 v1.0 Acute - Emotional Problems Keep From Work
